content: this intermediate-level project showcases a beautifully textured crochet mesh design worked from the bottom up in the round the pattern is meticulously written to guide you through each step ensuring a seamless and enjoyable crafting experience the spacious one-size bag is ideal for carrying your essentials in style whether you re heading to the market or out for a day of shopping crafted with hobby lobby s i love this cotton yarn this aran-weight creation offers a perfect blend of durability and softness embrace the art of crochet and create a timeless piece that reflects your unique style with the la via bag pattern **unique features-** intermediate-level crochet pattern crochet mesh design for a textured finish bottom-up construction method written pattern instructions for ease of use worked in the round for a seamless look **materials needed-** \-yarn 300-310 yards of hobby lobby s i love this cotton aran-weight yarn hook 5 0mm us size 8 0 hook 5mm us size 8 0 gauge 14 stitches by 6 5 row = 4 inches in 14 dcs x 6 5 row
